GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hmph... I can't find a path that leads
down to the <clr:0000>Forgotten Temple<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>How did it end up down there, anyway?


Maybe they built it at ground level, but
after a seismic shift, it got swallowed up
into the earth.
Or could it be <sp:5:0:0>they put it in down there
on purpose to <clr:0000>hide something important<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>
Hmmm.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That canyon alongside the road is called
Tanagar Canyon.

And at one end of it, there's a ruin known
as the <clr:0000>Forgotten Temple<clr:ffff>.

I'm thinking about heading down there
to investigate.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But the canyon...<sp:5:1:0>it's so deep. How am
I going to get down?
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease>I...I thought...<sp:5:0:0>that was it for me...<sp:5:0:0>
Thank you.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I really want to get to the bottom of
Tanagar Canyon, that canyon along
the road.
There's an amazing ruin at the bottom
called the <clr:0000>Forgotten Temple<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But I just...<sp:5:0:0> Urgh... <sp:5:0:0>I can't find a path
down there.

I've walked up and down this road so
many times, and nothing. <sp:5:0:0>Nothing!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I have to give you something in thanks
for rescuing me.

Please, take this. I think it will be helpful
on your journey.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>I was just offering up a prayer at
this memorial.<sp:5:1:0>

The only reason Hyrule still exists is that
there were those who fought for it.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>I know the kingdom has been a strange
and dangerous place since the Upheaval.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>But as we face the problems of today,
at least we can look to the people of the
past for inspiration.
<snd:Happy_00>They worked hard to have peace in their
time, and I'm going to do the same!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>By offering up my prayers, I am thanking
the spirits of those who kept Hyrule safe.

I'm also asking for them to protect and
guide me as I do my research.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>I may not be able to fight for my kingdom,
but I can defend it through my research!
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>Phew!<sp:5:0:0> Thanks. This area is more
dangerous than I thought.
Hello:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh, you're the one, uh...<sp:5:1:0>from the survey
team's whole misunderstanding about
that underpants thing.
I guess meeting you in a place like this
shows you're traveling all over too.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Scare>Please, save me!<sp:5:0:0> I don't want it all to
end here!
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Scare>Please, rescue me!<sp:5:0:0> I don't want to
become food for monsters!
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'd love to stretch my legs and go on
a stroll to <clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Tabantha
Tundra<clr:ffff>, really I would.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But I just am not cut out for the cold.<sp:5:0:0>


I've been told it's fine as long as you have
<clr:0000>food or clothing<clr:ffff> to <clr:0000>keep you warm<clr:ffff>.

<snd:Ease_01>But I'm not sure... Even just seeing snow
in the distance, I start to shiver.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What?! You want to investigate the
<clr:0000>Forgotten Temple<clr:ffff> with me?<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I wish I could take you up on that. But it's
at the bottom of Tanagar Canyon.

And I just haven't been able to find a path
down there.

But maybe if you look for one, you'll have
better luck.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>I've been rescued.<sp:5:0:0> Thanks. Don't know
how I would've made it on my own.
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ohhh...<sp:5:0:0> That really, really hurt.<sp:5:0:0> I'll still
be aching tomorrow.
Hello_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You know, I can't help thinking...


What would have happened to all those
people on the survey team if I'd never
traveled to Foothill Stable?
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Some of them would've gotten hurt if
they'd kept trying to do survey work in
their underpants.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>I'm just glad I could help everyone figure
out it was all a mistake. Our day-to-day
work is way too important.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks!<sp:5:0:0> You really saved me! There's no
way I could've survived that myself.
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh, th-that...<sp:5:0:0>that was the worst...<sp:5:0:0> But I
made it through somehow.
Hello_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_01>And, er,<sp:5:0:0> given that we cleared up that
misunderstanding, you sure you want to
be out here in the field like that?
I mean, you might be safe if you stick
around here, but it'd be dangerous to
head out into this snowy terrain that way.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Beneath us, there's an extraordinary ruin
called the <clr:0000>Forgotten Temple<clr:ffff>.

I just wish I knew how to get to it.


<sp:3:0:2:0800>You really have to wonder why the
ancients put it down there!

Hiding some kind of <clr:0000>priceless treasure<clr:ffff>,
perhaps? You never know!

<snd:LaughS>I say that as someone who considers
murals and dusty old monuments to be
priceless treasures.
I've learned that not everyone shares
that viewpoint.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>In a sense, we can be grateful it's raining
here. At least it's not cold enough for it
to snow.
That's why I've always been nervous
about visiting <clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff> in
<clr:0000>Tabantha Tundra<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>As nice as it sounds, I really cannot stand
the cold.<sp:5:0:0>

I've been told it's fine as long as you have
<clr:0000>food or clothing<clr:ffff> to <clr:0000>keep you warm<clr:ffff>.

<snd:Ease_01>But I'm not sure... Even just seeing snow
in the distance, I start to shiver.
Near_GoalPoint_01: How do I get down there?
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>Ah! You saved me!<sp:5:0:0> I can't believe it.
Thank you so, so much!
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Wh...<sp:5:0:0>what?!<sp:5:0:0> I've never seen anything
like that before.
